org.honton.chas.datadog.apm

Annotation Type TraceOperation


  • @InterceptorBinding
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface TraceOperation
    Marker annotation to indicate method or type should be traced. This marker will be honored by TraceContainerFilter, TraceProxyFactory and TraceInterceptor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static String DB
      The predefined type for datastore spans
      static String UNKNOWN
      The predefined type for unknown type spans
      static String WEB
      The predefined type for http/https spans

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String type
      Type of span to create.
      boolean value 

    • Field Detail

        The predefined type for datastore spans

        The predefined type for unknown type spans

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract boolean value
        Default:
        true

      • type

        public abstract String type
        Type of span to create. Usually something like 'web' or 'db'
        Returns:
        The type of span.
        Default:
        ""
